28.eng-name: Penalty of Hunting while on Pilgrimage

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:The Prophet (ﷺ) delivered a sermon at `Arafat and said, "Whoever does not get an Izar can wear trousers, and whoever cannot get a pair of shoes can wear Khuffs (socks made from thick fabric or leather)

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا لَمْ يَجِدِ الإِزَارَ فَلْيَلْبَسِ السَّرَاوِيلَ
chapter.eng-name: If an Izar is not available, one can wear trousers
